for _ in range(int(input().strip())):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    (n1, n2) = (n // 2 + 1, m // 2 + 1)
    print(n1, n2)

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for j in range(len(n)):
        n[j] = n[j] // 2 + 1
    print(*n, sep=' ')

t = int(input())
a = []
for i in range(t):
    row = input().split()
    for j in range(2):
        row[j] = int(row[j])
    a.append(row)
for i in range(t):
    n = a[i][0] // 2 + 1
    m = a[i][1] // 2 + 1
    print(n, m)
